title: For plots/layouts, where IOD is granted for partial development, this Regulation will apply for the
clause_text: For plots/layouts, where IOD is granted for partial development, this Regulation will apply for the balance potential of the plot, The fungible compensatory area is useable as regular FSI, Note:
